name: Why The Hell Would You Do This?
name_original: Why The Hell Would You Do This?
description:
[WEB BUILD NOT FUNCTIONAL. PLEASE DOWNLOAD ZIP FILE FOR NOW]

Why The HELL Would You Do This? is a multiplayer competitive bullet hell where players not only dodge through insane bullet patterns, but shoot them out as well! Take control of a space ship, and see how it feels to be the Boss!

Controllers Required

Joystick movement
Face buttons fire bullets
